org.openimaj.io

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.io.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods for dealing with files on the filesystem
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk), David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

                    File output)
                             throws IOException

      • copyStreamToFileBinary

        public static File copyStreamToFileBinary(InputStream stream,
                          File output)
                                   throws IOException
        Helper function for writing a binary stream to a file. The stream and the file are both closed on completion.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to be consumed.
        output - The file to output to
        Returns:
        The output file
        Throws:
        IOException

      • unpackJarFile

        public static File unpackJarFile(URL resource)
                          throws IOException
        Given a JAR Resource, this method will unpack the file to a temporary file and return the temporary file location. This temporary file will be deleted on the application exit. If the given resource is not a JAR resource, the method will return null.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to unpack
        Returns:
        The temporary file location
        Throws:
        IOException - If the temporary file could not be created.

      • unpackJarFile

        public static File unpackJarFile(URL resource,
                 boolean deleteOnExit)
                          throws IOException
        Given a JAR Resource, this method will unpack the file to a temporary file and return the temporary file location. If the given resource is not a JAR resource, the method will return null.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to unpack
        deleteOnExit - Whether to delete the temporary file on exit
        Returns:
        The temporary file location
        Throws:
        IOException - If the temporary file could not be created.

      • unpackJarFile

        public static void unpackJarFile(URL resource,
                 File destination,
                 boolean deleteOnExit)
        Given a JAR resource, this method will unpack the file to the given destination. If the given resource is not a JAR resource, this method will do nothing.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to unpack.
        destination - The destination file
        deleteOnExit - Whether to delete the unpacked file on exit.

      • isJarResource

        public static boolean isJarResource(URL resource)
        Returns whether the given resource is a jar resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to test.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the resource is a JAR resource

      • isJarResource

        public static boolean isJarResource(String resourceURL)
        Returns whether the given resource is a jar resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceURL - The resource to test.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the resource is in a jar.
